forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 32. North wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
